properties.description:
**THIS TASK IS FOR MORE EXPERIENCED MAPPERS**
------------------

- Author: **HOT / Kathmandu Living Labs volunteers**
- Requesting organization: **Nepal Government, International Response community**
- Priority: **Urgent**
- Imagery: **DigitalGlobe, 2015-05-03**

The objective is to help with aid delivery and search & rescue efforts by identifying earthquake damaged buildings and displaced populations.

Objects to trace
=====

* Report severely damaged housing areas - **landuse=brownfield**
* IDP informal camps

Please review the [Nepal Earthquake - IDP Collection Guidance](http://hotosm.github.io/tracing-guides/guide/Nepal.html#IDP Collection Guidance).
properties.author: fmoine
properties.short_description:
**THIS TASK IS FOR MORE EXPERIENCED MAPPERS**
=======

- Author: **HOT / Kathmandu Living Labs volunteers**
- Requesting organization: **Nepal Government, International Response community**
- Priority: **Urgent**
- Imagery: **DigitalGlobe, 2015-05-03**

The objective is to help with aid delivery and search & rescue efforts by identifying earthquake damaged buildings and displaced populations.

Objects to trace
=====
* Report severely damaged housing areas - `landuse=brownfield`
* IDP informal camps
properties.instructions:
**THIS TASK IS FOR MORE EXPERIENCED MAPPERS**
------------------

** Imagery 
source=Digital Globe, 2015-05-03

   **Click the following links to load  imagery in JOSM**:


* [ Digital Globe/GeoEye1 Langtang imagery 2015-05-3](http://127.0.0.1:8111/imagery?title=DigitalGlobe_20150503_Langtang&type=tms&url=tms:http://mw1.gstatic.com/crisisresponse/firstlook/2015/firstlook_PO_054342576010_01_2015_05_03_maptiles/{x}_{y}_{zoom}.png )

At the edge of this job, there is areas outsde of the scope of the DigitalGlobe imagery. But villages can be observed from Bing. It is important for these areas to use the Bing imagery and assure that the remote villages be added with landuse=residential polygons. Paths should also be added.
 
From the DigitalGlobe image. locate the villages and informal campsites.

** Report severely damaged housing areas - landuse=brownfield**
==========================
Trace a polygon around the block of houses and add the following tags

* **landuse=brownfield**
* **damage:event=nepal_earthquake_2015**
* **source=DigitalGlobe , 2015-05-03**


** IDP informal camps**
==========================
Trace a polygon around the tents where people are gathered and add the following tags

* **idp:camp_site=spontaneous_camp**
* **damage:event=nepal_earthquake_2015**
* **source=DigitalGlobe, 2015-05-03**

PLEASE reference the 
[Nepal Earthquake - IDP Collection Guidance](http://hotosm.github.io/tracing-guides/guide/Nepal.html#IDP Collection Guidance)
properties.name: Nepal Earthquake, 2015, Severely damaged housing areas and IDP Informal camps, Langtang
